column5: I got a dumb question, how do i do a product search at a CTC store. I have the product number and there site check store inventory, find a store, did that stuff, but does not tell you the inventory on the product, am i missing something here ? Thanks
I'm pretty sure the website will only say if it's in stock or not..
Yep... it will say "In Stock.. last inventory Feb xx, 2010".. or Contact Store.
